item.title: Mercedes Benz Atego 3030 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 19, 2025

Mercedes Benz Atego 3030 1.53 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz Atego 3030 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a versatile and highly detailed medium-duty truck to the game. Featuring high-quality textures, a fully detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics, this mod enhances the trucking experience. It includes various customization options, multiple chassis configurations, and advanced lighting effects, allowing for full personalization. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players who need a reliable truck for regional and urban deliveries.

Credits: equipe pa

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
